metadata.title: CVE-2023-1350 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in liferea. It has been rated as critical.Affected by this issue is the function update_job_run of the filesrc/update.c of the component Feed Enrichment. The manipulation of theargument source with the input |date >/tmp/bad-item-link.txt leads to oscommand injection. The attack may be launched remotely. The exploit hasbeen disclosed to the public and may be used. The name of the patch is8d8b5b963fa64c7a2122d1bbfbb0bed46e813e59. It is recommended to apply apatch to fix this issue. The identifier of this vulnerability isVDB-222848.

criterions.comment: liferea package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
